A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It pains me to give one of my favorite franchises such a bad review. Star Wars The Last Jedi was an overly political movie with rushed dialogue\, plot holes\, and uneven pace. The biggest atrocity being its confusing disregard for past movies and it's viewer base. It seems the spirit and heart of it's producers died with it as well. Get ready for 9 more!
